### Gun-ownership and Homicides
This is a group work project for course P6400, anaylizing the article [Gun ownership as a risk factor for homicide in the home (Kellermann et al., 1993)](https://www.nejm.org/doi/full/10.1056/NEJM199310073291506) from epidimeological angles.
